featured.text: 27 on the videos sit in bars, nightclubs, and roadhouses.
I went to a nightclub in New York and watched the stage lights go up.

definition.zh_def: 夜總會，一種提供音樂、舞蹈和飲料的娛樂場所，通常在晚上營業。
definition.en_def: A nightclub is an entertainment venue that operates at night, offering music, dancing, and drinks.
definition.example: We went to a popular nightclub to celebrate her birthday.
